content: ssk slip slip knit together bind off using a stretchy bind off i used this one set up knit 2 stitches slip 2 stitches back on the left needle st s stitch s and knit decrease through the back loops *k1 insert left ndl x times though fronts of both sts on right ndl from left to right © 2014 karen strauss you are free to sell booties made with your own hands using this pattern provided you give credit to the original pattern and to the designer however please do not sell or distribute the pattern ravelry name like2makethings
